snippet: For Republican supply-siders, denying that marginal tax rates are the sole way to induce or impede economic growth is equivalent to apostasy. History tells a different story.
abstract: For Republican supply-siders, denying that marginal tax rates are the sole way to induce or impede economic growth is equivalent to apostasy. History tells a different story.

headline.main: Do Lower Taxes Create Jobs? Look at Clinton and Bush.
